thread.section_title: Daniels Trading Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Daniels Trading | www.danielstrading.com
thread.title: Hope Houchins
thread.title_full: Daniels Trading reviewed by Hope Houchins

author: Hope Houchins
title: Hope Houchins
text: I am a novice to the trading world, and my broker has been very helpful, calling me at will to check on me. The entire process has been pleasant, from application to wiring the funds to getting started in the Futures world. I would recommend Daniels Trading to others.
